name: Rabbit Burn
description:
OverviewA tumultuous party of money, violence, and love!
Half nakid rabbit men and bunny girls run about and fight in violent explosions.
Crazy evolution of the billiards game! StoryYou are kidnaped by rabit masked men.
They brought you to a casino "Rabbit House".
Day and night, immoral games involving money, violence and love are hold there.
The winning prize is ownership of Rabbit House.
Clear all the stages, and get the glory!GameplayShoot the explosive billiard ball, and beat the rivals!
Clear stages by beating all the other rabbit men, and getting all the attractive bunny girls!Features20 stages in all.
Attracitive 30 heroines.
In gallery mode, you can enjoy love affair with heroines in various angles and situations.
Easy mouse operation.
Stage edit mode.
